cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB_ID to an invalid hex value '0xinvalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper gNB identification for the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting the gNB_ID to an invalid hex value '0xinvalid' will cause configuration parsing errors and prevent proper gNB identification for the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 gNB_ID 設定為無效的十六進位值 '0xinvalid' 會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止 DU 的正確 gNB 識別。
